snippet: Penn State found its coach in New England offensive coordinator Bill O'Brien, while the rest of college football prepares for a title game and college basketball features a rare power play basket.
abstract: Penn State found its coach in New England offensive coordinator Bill O'Brien, while the rest of college football prepares for a title game and college basketball features a rare power play basket.
lead_paragraph: It will be a slightly less dismal day in Still Trying to Be Happy Valley on Saturday when Penn State gets to announce that someone wanted to be its new football coach. The introduction of Patriots offensive coordinator Bill O'Brien will come with all the usual pronouncements of a bright future and a new start, but the overarching emotion will be relief. The sighs come because Penn State's tortured search found someone willing to don protective gear and enter college football's version of a SuperFund site.

headline.main: Leading Off: Penn State Gets a Coach; the Badgers Get Another Year from Montee Ball
